M

main(String[]) - Static method in class main.java.test.xor.TestXOR
Executes the XOR neuroevolution test with configured parameters: Initializes NEAT configuration for XOR (2 inputs, 1 output). Sets up evolutionary parameters and mutation rates. Runs evolution until termination criteria met. Evaluates population on all XOR combinations. Saves best performing network and visualization.
main.java.neat.config - package main.java.neat.config

MAX - main.java.neat.config.NEATConfig.FITNESS_CRITERION
Indicates that higher fitness values are better.
MAX - main.java.neat.config.NEATConfig.SPECIES_FITNESS_FUNCTION
Uses the maximum fitness value among all genomes in the species.
MAX - main.java.neat.functions.AggregationFunction.AGGREGATION_FUNCTION
Returns the maximum input value.
MAXABS - main.java.neat.functions.AggregationFunction.AGGREGATION_FUNCTION
Returns the maximum absolute value from inputs.
MEAN - main.java.neat.config.NEATConfig.SPECIES_FITNESS_FUNCTION
Uses the arithmetic mean of all fitness values in the species.
MEAN - main.java.neat.functions.AggregationFunction.AGGREGATION_FUNCTION
Calculates the average of input values.
MEDIAN - main.java.neat.config.NEATConfig.SPECIES_FITNESS_FUNCTION
Uses the median fitness value of all genomes in the species.
MEDIAN - main.java.neat.functions.AggregationFunction.AGGREGATION_FUNCTION
Returns the median of input values.
MIN - main.java.neat.config.NEATConfig.FITNESS_CRITERION
Indicates that lower fitness values are better.
